io.leonis.torch.window

Class Modal

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.torch.window.Modal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.BasePane, com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Composite, com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Window

    public final class Modal
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Window
    The Class Modal A decorator for a Window to make it behave as an modal. Simply adding Hint#MODAL and Hint#CENTERED as hints and enabling closing with escape.

    • Nested Class Summary
